infodynamics.utils

Class EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.utils.MeasurementDistribution
      • infodynamics.utils.EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeasurementDistributionPermutationsOverSubsets

    public class EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution
extends MeasurementDistribution
    Structure to hold a distribution of info-theoretic measurements, and a significance value for how an original measurement compared with these, which is determined empirically by bootstrapping.
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)
